Rockville.Shady Grove, Maryland:
Shady Grove is an unincorporated area of Montgomery County, Maryland. It has a population of 5,000-7,000, between the cities of Rockville and Gaithersburg, mostly in zip codes 20850 and 20855, though the exact boundaries are not officially defined.


== History ==

Shady Grove is one of Montgomery County's upper middle class areas.
